projects.title: Episys Symitar API
projects.description: Design and implement a RESTful API that exposes core Symitar system functionality via secure HTTP. Technologies: Node.js, Express, Redis, Symitar SymConnect

projects.title: TILA-RESPA Integrated Disclosure
projects.description: Implemented this Federal Government compliance measure to consolidate documents dealing with closed-end credit transactions secured by real property. Technologies: HTML/CSS/AJAX, AngularJS (incl Angular Material), Node.js (with Express/iisnode), Adobe Acrobat Pro, Symitar PowerOn

projects.title: Electronic Lien Titling Conversion
projects.description: Aided in switching Electronic Lien Titling providers by streamlining the process and reducing manual tasks. Technologies: HTML/CSS/AJAX, Bootstrap, Node.js (with Express/iisnode), MSSQL
